name: 9.27 "Uncle Sam Wants You" Quiz | 'Cheers'- Season 9 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What kind of book did Woody get in the mail?
questions.explanation:
Crossword puzzle.

	He said that it was great because all the answers were in the back of the book. This way he didn't need to worry about trying to figure out all the clues. Norm said, "These are great once you get the hang of them."

questions.text: Who called in sick to work?
questions.explanation:
Lilith.

	She said that herself, Frasier and Frederick were having family quality time. When she said she disguised her voice to appear ill, Carla said, "And the Oscar goes to..."

questions.text: What time in the morning did Sam go to the Cranes' house?
questions.explanation:
5:53.

	He said he came to watch "Huckleberry Hound". Lilith was the one who mentioned the time because she was upset that Sam showed up so early in the morning.

questions.text: Why didn't Lilith like people seeing her in her nightgown?
questions.explanation:
It undermined her authority.

	Frasier replied, "I wouldn't worry about that dear." Lilith wanted Frasier to get Sam to stop coming over so often and so early to spend time with Frederick.

questions.text: What did Frasier tell Sam regarding Frederick?
questions.correct: I made him and I get to keep him!
options: Frederick likes me more than you!
questions.explanation:
I made him and I get to keep him!.

	When Sam told Frederick to go to daddy, he went to Sam. Frasier said that Sam turned Frederick against him.

questions.text: Can Frasier make love to Lilith in the morning?
questions.explanation:
no.

	This was mentioned a couple of times.  Frasier told Sam, "God forbid while the sun is up."

questions.text: When Sam said he liked kids, what did Frasier tell him?
questions.correct: If you like kids so much, why don't you get one of your own.
options: Women don't see you as father material, only as a sex object.
Sam, you'd be a horrible father, so forget it.
Get a grip, Sam, you can't just make a baby.
questions.explanation:
If you like kids so much, why don't you get one of your own.

	Frasier apologized to Sam for saying that. He said he loved Sam, but it was too early to lose the love of one's child.

questions.text: Who was the first person Sam asked to make a baby with him?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla told him she wasn't about to get pregnant an eighth time because he was lonely. Before he asked, Carla suggested he get a dog or a plant.  For those of you who might think Carla was already pregnant eight times (she has eight children) the seventh pregnancy produced her twins Jesse and Elvis, ergo she has eight children but was only pregnant seven times.

questions.text: Besides Woody, who suggested that Sam ask Rebecca to make a baby?
questions.explanation:
Elvis Presley.

	Sam heard Elvis speaking to him in a dream. When he told Frasier what Elvis said, Frasier replied, "The man is dead!"

questions.text: Did Rebecca agree to be the mother of Sam's child?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	She thought having a baby would make people stop thinking of her as a loser. When she was leaving she put the coat rack on her along with the coat making Sam question if she was the right woman. He said, "You'd better be right, Elvis."
